entities.description: The age at which kidney disease was first diagnosed.
The age at which asthma was first diagnosed.
Indicates whether the individual still has asthma.
The age at which the individual found out they had HIV or AIDS.
Indicates whether the individual is currently taking prescription medicine for high blood pressure.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to the age they were first diagnosed with kidney disease.
Relates the respondent to the age they were first diagnosed with asthma.
Indicates whether the respondent currently has asthma.
Relates the respondent to the age they found out they had HIV or AIDS.
Indicates whether the respondent is currently taking prescription medication for high blood pressure.
